Title: CASE OF E.B. v. ROMANIA
Conclusion(s): Violation of Article 3 - Prohibition of torture (Article 3 - Positive obligations) (Substantive aspect)
Violation of Article 8 - Right to respect for private and family life (Article 8 - Positive obligations Article 8-1 - Respect for private life)
Keywords: (Art. 8) Right to respect for private and family life
